title:
Symbolic calculus for a class of pseudodifferential operators with
  applications to compactness
authors: \'Arp\'ad B\'enyi, Tadahiro Oh, and Rodolfo H. Torres
abstract:
We prove a symbolic calculus for a class of pseudodifferential operators, and
discuss its applications to $L^2$-compactness via a compact version of the
$T(1)$ theorem.
